mapper.select: select c.idcurso as codigo, c.idcarrera as codcarrera, ca.nombre as carrera, c.idciclo as codciclo, ci.nomciclo as ciclo, s.idseccion as codseccion, s.nomseccion as nomseccion, c.nombre as nombre from detallecursoseccion ds inner join seccion s on ds.idseccion = s.idseccion inner join curso c on ds.idcurso = c.idcurso inner join carrera ca on c.idcarrera = ca.idcarrera inner join ciclo ci on c.idciclo = ci.idciclo inner join usuario u on ds.idusuario = u.idusuario where u.idusuario = #{idusuario} order by c.idciclo ASC;
